website_summaries.verdict: Long wear, exciting colors, and good value earn OPI nail lacquers our high marks. A top-selling brand among professional and at-home manicurists.
pros: Surpasses others for its long wear and numerous shades that has made it a favorite brand of professional manicurists
Goes on smoothly and evenly, and most shades look great with just one coat
cons: Some shades, especially darker ones, may chip quicker
Bubbles in the lacquer have been reported after shaking it in preparation for use

customer_reviews.title: ) was bright like the one in the photo
customer_reviews.text: REALLY upset. The color I got is an old, clumpy version. The one I saw in Macy's (for $12!!!!) was bright like the one in the photo, and the application was smooth. This one has obviously been repurposed after sitting around for maybe years and honestly, it looks like it was mixed with something else and not fully stirred in. Really not happy with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Bogata blackberry solid replacement for Romeo & Joliet!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing my own manicures for years and I typically used Opi polishes. One of my all time favorite polishes is Romeo & Joliet but recently was discontinued. A nail tech recommended bogata blackberry as a similar color and so far I LOVE IT!! It is incredibly close to R&J. In different lighting the hues definitely change but it’s a very beautiful polish! I applied Bogata blackberry and CND Vinylux top coat six days ago and it still looks great! I’ll definitely be back for this color!!
customer_reviews.author: Strawbabies017

customer_reviews.title: Malaga Wine by OPI.
customer_reviews.text: About 4 years ago Sally's quit carrying OPI Malaga Wine. I have worn this color for years and looked everywhere but couldn't find it so I thought it had been discontinued. Well, Amazon had it! I was so thrilled I ordered 2 bottles. I love the product and LOVE the color. I can go up to 8 weeks between pedicures using base coat 2 coats polish and one top coat. Never chips and stays shiny from first day until I remove it. Can't beat it...may cost a bit more but well worth it IMHO. It helps if ppl include color when doing reviews because there are so many to choose from...
customer_reviews.author: klrnmesa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this color. It's a cross between red, pink, and orange. I saw a similar color on a woman at my son's school and loved it so much I searched for something similar. I found this color through Pinterest pics then found it on Amazon. Checked it against the woman I originally saw with it...same color! She has dark, Olive toned skin & I am very fair skinned so the color seems to work for anyone! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MrsGoe

customer_reviews.title: Was old and thickened already
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this color! However, when it arrived, it was a little thick the first time I used it. Well, I should have complained right away, but of course, I didn’t. I tried it again-don’t know what made me think it wouldn’t be just as hard to use the second time. Then, I spent $6.00 buying lacquer thinner which really only works temporarily. Not a good solution. With the thinner, I ended up paying way too much for this. Save your money and buy from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: One bottle arived in good shape, the second bottle was broken and leaked in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT RED !
customer_reviews.text: Always trying to find a red that looks good and not garrish - this color is PERFECT. The slight metallic tones down the red. Lasts a good week with some small touch-ups and topped with China Glaze Instant Dry Top Coat (dries in less than a minute) which also gives it more shine. One star off because it does start to thicken before I've used the whole bottle and I need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: MDT00

customer_reviews.title: Love OPI's I'm Not Really a Waitress polish, but this bottle is old
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite polish since FOREVER. I love love love the color. The problem with this actual bottle is that it is thick, like when polish gets old. I used it three times and the third time it was way too thick to use. This is not inexpensive polish, nor is it normally bad quality polish. Have been using OPI polish for a very long time and this is the first time this has ever happened when I purchased polish. Guess I won't order online anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Eldred

customer_reviews.title: Great Wear!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the brands I have used OPI Nail Laquers wear best on natural nails. I love this blue based red. It serves as a great year round color.
customer_reviews.author: GLR

customer_reviews.title: Great nail polish!  Wish more colors were available
customer_reviews.text: My favorite OPI nail lacquer in red. I Swear I’m Not Really A Cocktail Waitress was my color. My favorite red ever since a friend have it to me and told me it was “my” color. I’ve had a bottle ever since. So glad to get it again! Great long lasting color that stays true to color and I have never had a color stain my nails. I don’t use a top coat so the usual small amount of chipping from baths, dishes without gloves, etc. I don’t use a bottom coat but it doesn’t have any problems associated with that. I’m just too lazy. I just basically do a pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Safranek

customer_reviews.title: This One Is In My Top Five
customer_reviews.text: I'm not usually a fan of the red polishes. I tend to stick with the purples,and pinks. I've purchased a few reds, but none really made it to my top five. "I'm really not just a waitress" is BEAUTIFUL! I absolutely love it! I love the shine, the length of time it remains on, and most importantly the color. I am very hard on my polish. O.P.I. is the only brand that can withstand the tough job on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: StarcatcherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I spent half a day putting on a base coat, two coats of this lacquer which is an amazing color, then a top coat. One fingernail chipped a couple of hours later. Most all of them had chipped within 3 days. Very disappointed. I can't walk and live in a power chair, so you can imagine how easy I am on my hands. Nothing done to cause the chipping. It was quite shocking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHADE OF RED.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing color! I was eating in a restaurant in Brooklyn when this well put together woman sauntered in and sat down next to me with her perfectly manicured nails. I could not stop staring at the perfect shade of red on her fingers and had to stop her mid-bite to inquire about the polish. She said it was OPI Big Apple Red. I ran home. Ordered it. It arrived. I slathered it on my nails. I have now become the well put together woman with amazing nails that strangers admire. Mission accomplished. This is a gorgeous color and the perfect shade of red. I hope OPI never ever stops making this.
customer_reviews.author: Kat D

customer_reviews.title: Rich and Classy
customer_reviews.text: I use OPI polish because, most importantly, it is formaldehyde-free. It is also durable and offers great colors. The Washington DC color line is particularly rich and classy. If you are looking for a healthier polish that makes a statement without screaming, this polish is for you!
customer_reviews.author: J. de la C

customer_reviews.title: Great Color!
customer_reviews.text: To my mind, Back to Reality is one of the best colors OPI has put out in years! Used in combination with OPI's base coat and top coat, it lasted 6 days and looked great the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: fen

customer_reviews.title: I don't believe it was an OPI polish
customer_reviews.text: The color was good, however I do not think this is an OPI brand. I buy OPI and Essie all the time. This was my first nail polish bought on line. The bottle was somewhat different....the polish was rather thin....it had a strong smell and the polish chipped within a few days....never had issues with any of OPIs before. The color was what i I wanted since I've had it before ..but nothing else was right about it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A true signature red
customer_reviews.text: This is my signature color. I keep coming back to it time and again. Was time to have it in my own collection. (And I'm a long-retired waitress.) The color is a perfect red that has depth and substance. It goes with pretty much most everything as it pulls in all sorts of interesting tones. When, on occasion, I choose a different red, I always somewhat regret it. I want THIS red.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Razzano

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: If you want a timeless red nail polish, I'm Not Really A Waitress is for you. And don't confuse timeless or classic with boring--this is a red with depth and subtle shimmer. You know. If you're an OPI fan, you've probably tried it already. But for newbies and in general, OPI is a good brand. When I paint my toes with an OPI polish, it lasts--with little to no chipping--until I take it off. (I always have my fingernails professionally painted, so I can't speak as to how it wears with a home application.)
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: Coca Cola red is THE best shade of red ever
customer_reviews.text: If you need a perfect red for all year around, get Coca Cola red!! I can’t say it enough, everyone needs this color in their collection. This is one of my top go-to’s. The formula is amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williams

customer_reviews.title: A perfect dark red lacquer for year around wear .
customer_reviews.text: A nice dark red for any skin tone . I will wear this lovely red lacquer year around . I’m partial to very dark reds , be it clothing or nail polish , they flatter me the most so that may be my happiness with this color . It looks different in certain lighting too , outside , it’s a subdued dark neutral red that looks amazing wearing jeans . It just looks natural , not garish & cheap . Indoors it can look like a black cherry color . It doesn’t lean too blue toned either , which I really like . It’s a classic for a reason .
customer_reviews.author: Kitty .E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color for KC Chiefs fan!
customer_reviews.text: OPI nail polish, once again, did not disappoint! Love the color - Big Apple Red! This manicure is an OPI base coat, 2 coats of nail lacquer, and top coat! Needed a red color to wear with my Chiefs gear, and this is perfect! Love the long lasting wear of OPI products!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna S.

customer_reviews.title: The color is more of a salmon color
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a bright pink - it is not. It is more a pastel salmon color. This only made me miss buying things in person more during COVID.
customer_reviews.author: Firenze

customer_reviews.title: Solid light coral red
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice low-key medium-light coral red that leans slightly to the cool side of warm. Usual high quality OPI polish. I have had this a couple years with a few uses, I buy OPI because as long as I shake it thoroughly at least a couple times a year, they stay good for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: RecoverInBeautyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: My favorite red
customer_reviews.text: I got this shade done as a pedicure and forgot to look at the name. I made a special trip back to the salon just to look up the name and order it for myself. I chose this in October and I thought it was more of a bronze, but I can see it being listed in the reds instead of bronze. It's got a metallic tone to it. I love it, I ordered 2 bottles so I wouldn't be without it. I wear it on my toenails, so unless I kick something, the color lasts for weeks without chipping. This is definitely my go-to color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: VERY Dark
customer_reviews.text: I love OPI. I wear all shades, so the fact this one looks black means I will still use it, but this one is VERY dark. At first glance to everyone I asked, they all replied "black". I was hoping for a deeply saturated maroon and this one just misses the mark. I noticed it seemed to chip/flake quicker than my lighter and nude shades.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Glorious Red
customer_reviews.text: OPI nailed this one. The color is rich, luscious and vibrant like a candy apple. Its deep hue would complement any skin tone. As with all OPI polish, it goes on smoothly and wears well. One day I would like them to make a smaller brush to better access the sides of the nail. For now, it’s my brand choice. I purchased a quick dry top coat and rapid drying drops. Both from a different vendor. I was dry in a very short time with no residue. Off and running again.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Nancy

customer_reviews.title: True Coca Cola Red!
customer_reviews.text: I remember using this product a few years ago when OPI launched their collab with Coca Cola in my local nail salon, and I fell in LOVE with the color. I've honestly never received as many compliments as I did when wearing it. When I went to buy the color myself OPI discontinued it! :( Luckily, when I went to OPI's website not too long ago and they directed me to the link here in Amazon, and I'm SO HAPPY! It is just as I remembered, a beautiful bright TRUE red.
customer_reviews.author: cmahn89

customer_reviews.title: My fave color and brand nail polish!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail polish. OPI is a great brand of nail polish, a bit pricey but it lasts. I've been buying OPI for years. Specifically I've been buying and wearing this color for many years it's my go to color. Call me simple but it is a gorgeous color and I always get complimented on my polish when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love the color it's one of my favorite nail colors. Unfortunately, this nail polish does not last longer than about three days and that's with a top coat. It starts chipping almost right away. I'm not sure if it's because the nail polish itself is so thick. It has a difficult time drying 2 coats 5 minutes, It's still wet. Whatever the issue is with this nail polish. It's just a process too much of a process for $10 nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and durable nail polish . You get what you spend. Last longer than cheap nail polish .
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Color So Hot It Berns
customer_reviews.text: This is the epitome of a perfect polish if you’re looking for a classic, blue red. Not at all garish, its simplicity radiates elegance and class. It goes on smoothly, and best of all, it covers consistently in just one, single coat. I used it as a base color for a chinoiserie mani with Chinese characters and symbols stamped in gold. So timeless and elegant. Love, love, LOVE this color!
customer_reviews.author: ChefCatTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Bright, pretty color!
customer_reviews.text: It is OPI so the quality is good. It seems to be authentic. The color is more red than I expected - I thought it would be more orange. However, it is very pretty and I would recommend. It is opaque, not sheer and I could get away with one coat, but two coats look perfect!
customer_reviews.author: gijo

customer_reviews.title: I don't remember nights in Moscow being brown
customer_reviews.text: OPI is renowned for excellent polish, so this stuff hits all the marks. However, if you're looking for a dark red, this isn't your colour. Though beautiful in the bottle, on nail it definitely has a brown tint to it (I've had several people confirm this), and that isn't what I was going for. Because this item is flamable, you can't send it back for a refund, so buy with the colour thing in mind!
customer_reviews.author: xayc

customer_reviews.title: This product was a huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have bought OPI nail polish for years with no issues & love their products. However, the Cajun Shrimp bubbled every time I applied it & chipped in days. I bought this color on a recommendation of a FB friend for a summer vacation and had to replace it with an inexpensive brand at a big box store. The inexpensive brand was the same color and was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: This is the darkest nail polish that has ever been on my nails!!!
customer_reviews.text: Midnight Moscow: This is the darkest nail polish that has ever been on my nails!!! the first day at school I had my nails painted this color, all my friends asked me if I was turning goth. (?!) if you look really REALLY close in the light it will look brown with dark red sparkles. I have to admit, this is really good at sticking to your nails. It goes on perfectly, but doesn't come off for anything.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Rockin' Cajun Fun Times for my Toesies
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this OPI Cajun Shrimp nail polish color. I picked it out at the salon when I went to get my piggies painted and knew I had chosen wisely! It's a perfect combo of red, with just a dash of coral, which means it goes well with EVERYTHING. You know how some corals are just TOO orangey? This one isn't. Much more of an actual red undertone. What more can I say? We all know OPI polishes rock, and this has to be my new fave, second only to my all time favorite color, "I'm Not Really a Waitress".
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bass

customer_reviews.title: Hot Hot Hot mama Red !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful red, looks amazing on ethnic skin tones from olive complexion to mochas and everything in between, however I don't feel it looks as popping on pale skin. The undertones of this color just don't suit pale skin as well. Just my opinion. The color is perfection in person!! It's a must have red
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color—Only Lasts a Week Before Chipping!
customer_reviews.text: OPI products look great—but, they don't last, and I found I need to treat myself to a manicure every 6 or 7 days. I tried two colors, and both deliver the same results—by day seven, you can kiss your manicure goodbye. However, I really like the color, and OPI's smooth application makes it worth it. If it weren't for the chipping, this lacquer deserves high marks! So, 4 stars . . .
customer_reviews.author: Copyreader

customer_reviews.title: “Midnight in Moscow” is BROWN!
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks like a dark red/purplish “midnight” leaves me to think black. It’s not. It’s brown with very small unnoticeable red specks. It’s not the worst color but it’s not what I was looking for. Sadly, it’s non returnable to Amazon so it’ll just become one of my collection. Not sure how often I will use it though.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful color from OPI! It is not sheer and has a light sparkle to it. It's almost on the pinkish side rather than red (kind of like a pink rusty color). I paired it with Sally Hansen base and top coat and it stayed on pretty well for the most part (about a week with some minor chips). Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: More brown less red
customer_reviews.text: great polish but the color is much darker than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: RRZR

customer_reviews.title: OPI Red polish
customer_reviews.text: OPI polish is the best nail polish there is in my opinion! I love all the reds! Lasts until I take it off, great price for the money, & perfect for a gift if your friend loves reds in nail polish! I'd recommend OPI Red nail polish to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Color was off. Order at your own risk.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Coca-Cola red, but I received something really close... The c-c red at my nail shop has a low key shimmer - like a coke can. I'm wearing it on my toes & wanted to have a bottle at home for touch ups. But The polish I received does not have that shimmer. Wish I had written this before I started doing my nails so I could give a side by side comparison. Le Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cajun Shrimp is my new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid OPI collector (over 150 bottles) and this one is at the top of my favorites list. It's absolutely stunning. It will be beautiful on any length nail. It holds true to OPI quality. Goes on smooth, color is rich and lasted over 10 days. The picture is with two coats color and a quick dry top coat. I highly recommend this color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: OPI is the best I have found/use only this brand
customer_reviews.text: OPI is the best polish I have used. Though, images of colors not exactly what you receive. But that happens even in stores. Would have rated higher all the same, though found at a quite less expensive pricing at another site, which I am unsure I can name here. But did receive what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Covets Owls

customer_reviews.title: This is straight up black / black cherry chutney
customer_reviews.text: This looks straight up black when on your nails. I don't hate it but, I am a bit on the spooky side. There is barely any hint of red and no shimmer. Like I said, I like it but it is not like the pictures so, be ware :)
customer_reviews.author: Ms Blatvasky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nail Polish, Love Red Hot Rio.
customer_reviews.text: Great color, a true Chinese red, this is my second bottle. Also, I find Opi doesn’t thicken in the bottle as much as Essie, so you don’t need thinner after the first half is used. .
customer_reviews.author: DuganLSR

customer_reviews.title: The best AND worst nailpolish
customer_reviews.text: I love OPI nail polish and this is one of my favorite colors, However, this polish is OLD. It is thick and practically unable to use. A normal polish is easy to put on, especially on the side of your nail. This, I was barely able to get the brush to put the polish one the edges of my nails. One layer of polish looks like 3!! Thick and not smooth. Waste of money for me because this old, thick polish is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe Target

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for OPI
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing OPI nail polish for years and have never known it to chip within hours of application. I recently added this color to my collection and was surprised to find it did not adhere well. After multiple repairs I gave up and repeated my manicure from scratch with a different polish. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RNLindaS

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This brand has never failed me. I always buy it, it may be more costly--but I use one bottle to 5 of another brand and I have tried them all.... I will always buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Love

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors and shine for your nails
customer_reviews.text: Like the availability of colors and the 'shine' this polish gives to your nails. It lasts well for polish. Gel lasts longer-however difficult to remove and can damage your nails, so I recommend using the OPI - polish a little more often and keep your nails healthy - no 'ridges and/or gouges' from trying to remove like you get with gel.
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Love this Fall Color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this color! Museum color! It’s a perfect burnt orange for Fall! Only thing is I believe this has had something added to it because it was very thin when I put it on. Normal OPI isn’t thin at all. I found this at the nail salon and couldn’t find it I’m store so I ordered It on Amazon. Love this color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loves2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the ORIGINAL OPI NAIL LACQUER!!!
customer_reviews.text: As long as you use ONLY OPI nail base coat, your color will adhere to it. However, as soon as you add the top coat, it starts to pull away from the edge if your nails snd will eventually crack off. Sad cause I really like their polish🥴
customer_reviews.author: Lia Jay

customer_reviews.title: My go-to pedi color
customer_reviews.text: I love this color, and it's not always available in salons, plus I like to be able to do repair in between.
customer_reviews.author: EBConnect

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY PERFECT COLOR
customer_reviews.text: PRETTY PERFECT COLOR! A classic -- really is Coca-Cola red. Saw it on a woman in the nail spa. Chased her down, as she was leaving, for the name. I ordered that very day. Very pleased! Will certainly buy again. Like most OPI great coverage, and opaque quality.
customer_reviews.author: R.N.Vaughn-Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sensual, stunning, luscious color. Classy not brassy. I wore it long ago on my first honeymoon. And now, wonderfully I am able to introduce another beloved to its' temptation. I am thrilled that you have your choice between standard and gel. The gel simply does not chip. I am informed that my fingers and toes now constitute sexy nibbles meant to tempt his mind. And that makes both of us happy. May this color perfection never be lost, never go away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product...horrible boxing/shipping conditions.
customer_reviews.text: As always OPI is an excellent product. The only reason this is a 4 star review instead of a 5 is that all of my bottles were thrown in the same box without being individually wrapped. I honestly cannot believe that none were shattered. Thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: BigMama

customer_reviews.title: It will look good on both your fingernails and toenails
customer_reviews.text: It's just the right kind of red, not too pink or too dark, and no shimmer. It can be classy or lively, however you wanna wear it. It will look good on both your fingernails and toenails. It's a good color for both summer and Christmas. There's minimum chipping in the first week of wearing it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: What?!

customer_reviews.title: Winter Red
customer_reviews.text: This is a winter red. Truthfully I put it on one finger in August or September & I felt it was to dark to transition from summer to fall. That said come winter it will be perfect. But to me it’s not sheer at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Not the same logo as all of my other ones. The label at the bottom is a different font and color. Yeah could be a different production lot but it also smells different from the other ones I have. Acetone smell. Two stars because the color is not too bad. A little more red than black (midnight in Moscow) but a good copycat. I wouldn’t pay 10.50 for a counterfeit again though.
customer_reviews.author: Mom. Mom! MOOMMMMM!

customer_reviews.title: The best fall color polish
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of OPI polishes and this color is a fall/winter classic. I'll keep purchasing it again and again as long as they keep making it. It goes on nicely but definitely takes two coats to get the best look. The color is a very deep, dark, rich, winey burgundy. Some reviews mention glitter but really it's shimmery rather than glittery; it has a very subtle frost effect. It's a beautiful color. The wear is typical for OPI, doesn't chip too easily. Like with all nail polishes, use a clear base coat and top coat to get the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, pinky red
customer_reviews.text: I picked color at salon based on shade not title and fell in love with the color so I bought the bottle on Amazon. The shade in the bottle is not what it looks like in person. The bottle shade looks dull mauve-red. In person it is a pinky cherry red.
customer_reviews.author: Plummy

customer_reviews.title: Dries quick
customer_reviews.text: This is great polish! It goes on nice and easy, the color is beautiful and it dries faster than regular polish. I would say the first coat dries within 5 minutes and then I apply a second coat and it dries quick too!
customer_reviews.author: David Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo pretty! I got my nails done for my brother's wedding and spotted this beautiful color and just had to buy it! Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  vivid rich color of exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.text: This color is my signature color! I love OPI such a good quality product. I was so amazed to find it on Amazon. The shipping was really quick. Being locked down and not able to go shopping this was an amazing find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as previously purchase OPI Red
customer_reviews.text: I understand that there can be a slight variation in color, but this was so far removed from previously purchased polish labeled the same color. OPI Red is one of my favorite colors. This was not the same. It is more fuchsia than red and has a dull finish.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Love This Color
customer_reviews.text: I initially got this item because I loved the name and in November 2016, I was hopeful it might come true. But I fell in love with the color. I've often used OPI nail color, but this is my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great color, disappointed about paper marks everywhere after applying
customer_reviews.text: Love this nail polish but I always end up leaving red marks on papers at work the whole time I wear the red color. Why am I spending $10+ On nail polish that is marking up everything! I even tried putting a clear coat of OPI and it still doesn’t stop it completely.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I received compliments on my nail color often. Easy to apply, does not clamp, color last a long time on the nail bed. OPI Carries a great product and Amazon carries a great deal. This is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Graham

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off.
customer_reviews.text: The color looks completely different than the picture on here. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JBBaxter

customer_reviews.title: Purdy!
customer_reviews.text: What a pretty color! More of a red based orange than the orange based red I had been searching for. The polish stays shiny, which I love. The perfect red for the spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: jaimeloo24

customer_reviews.title: Yummy color
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the color. Red but not more subtle. Makes you kinda go is it red, or pink maybe orange. I love the look.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stamper

customer_reviews.title: OPI rules the nail color market with this one
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to reds, no one compares to the OPI line. You can spend twice as much and not get the same rich color or lasting wear that you get with this color. Great when you want to draw attention to you hands!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. This nail polish is a little sheer though on the first coat. I have to use two coats. It dries relatively fast, last a long time, and is surprisingly easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn101

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the color.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but the bottle of polish I received was much darker than it looked on the computer. OPI polish is the best in another color, and just beware they won't let you return it....
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: One coat is good enough, two coats is better
customer_reviews.text: If you are correctly prepping your nails and using a base coat and a top coat then this nail polish goes a long way. It will chip quickly if not- however the color pay off and ease of application is a breeze. It also dries very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Standard quality for OPI, but color is meh
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, but the color is no where near as red as the photo (even accounting for screen color differences). It is a much lighter and almost gold color.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The nail polish itself is definitely a 5 star. Opi is my favorite brand. Quick drying, stays on for weeks. However, I did not give a 5 star due to the fact the color match isn't exact. It's definitely a red and I was thinking more of a deeper, darker wine. It's still gorgeous though!
customer_reviews.author: Berkley Bramsen

customer_reviews.title: Best nail polish ever
customer_reviews.text: Most beautiful, long lasting color I've ever used. This polish is smooth and vibrant. I love O.P.I. but this just knocks it out of the park. It's a warm, hot red that truly goes with anything. You can dress it up or dress it down. It took 2 weeks before any chipping and that was my fault. This formula seems above and beyond the other polishes. This color is great for all seasons, any style and it compliments any skin tone. I am a huge fan!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bell

customer_reviews.title: Big Apple Red Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this OPI Big Apple Red polish. It’s exactly the red I’ve been looking for. I took this polish to the nail salon with me and I was pleased that OPI has a powder so I used this polish on my toes and got the powder matching color on my nails.9
customer_reviews.author: MzFlo1

customer_reviews.title: Love This Color
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect color for me. It’s a defunct limited edition, which is why I paid twice as much as I should have. But it was worth it. I’ll be wearing it all fall and winter. If you’re a pale-skinned redhead, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: Shiny✨

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant color :)
customer_reviews.text: Always searching for a color that I can wear year-round and this is definitely it! Two coats of this polish covered with the Seche Vite Dry Fast Top Coat is my favorite combination. Looks amazing on short nails! Perfect for those who love to wear black polish.
customer_reviews.author: Cwish

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a gel polish that can be used with up lamp. Over all OpI products are the best. Just read the fine prints and don’t make the same mistake as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite dark colors...
customer_reviews.text: OPI lasts on my nails like no other polish. AND I volunteer at a nursing home doing nails...lasts 10 days on some of the patients.
customer_reviews.author: Arec

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Fabulous Price. Quick Delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I love this polish. Fantastic color and durability. Was delivered in 2 days. $1.50 less than beauty supply stores sell it for. If you can find it in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Nuna

customer_reviews.title: it is amazing. My aunt loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift, and with all OPI products, it is amazing. My aunt loves it, and it came really well packaged. The only bone I'd pick with it is that is isn't really Coca-Cola Red, it's much more muted, but the color is still fantastic. I love finding OPI on Amazon, because while I don't usually purchase this brand for myself, I do for my family (nail polish snobs), and the price is so much better here than in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Howey

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand but this color is a bit more orangie that I was expecting.  Still pretty, just slightly orange tinge.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand a lot. It goes on smooth, you can layer it thick and it drys quickly. It does not peal off or chip either! Even with lots of activity and washing, etc... it stays until you take it off. I can usually go over two weeks and it still holds up.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this product
customer_reviews.text: too red and not enough color choices. also too expensive. Did not help my nails
customer_reviews.author: sonshine

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit product. The packaging and labeling do not match that of real OPI nail polish and the product is thin, watery, and of poor quality. The color doesn’t even quite match the OPI color.
customer_reviews.author: ELLEZEE

customer_reviews.title: Great color for fall
customer_reviews.text: I love OPI. Stays on and colors are great. This color is great for fall but I wear it all year round. A good red that’s a little darker than True Red
customer_reviews.author: Ceiler

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Color is as expected, it’s one of my favorite reds, but it took it a really long time to arrive and when I ordered it the “virus” was not here yet.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I'm an OPI addict but this red is to die for
customer_reviews.text: Amazing red. This is darker than the new danke shiny red but this is a deep dark shiny ruby with a bit of shimmer. Looks like it has a top coat before I put the top coat on. It's that Christmas red I was looking for. Great in one coat. With 3 it would be vampy if thats what you are looking for. A richness of color too good to be true. I have Big Apple Red as well which is a flat pure red that doesn't have the jewel tone, the depth, the richness I was looking for. This one does. Perfect for the holidays and all through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: This color, no smiles
customer_reviews.text: Gummy, old This color is one of my absolute favorite. This bottle of polish was very disappointing, the polish was thick, and gummy...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: When you put on the OPI trio, BASE, COLOR, TOP Coat you have a very strong manicure that will last for quite a while. This is worth you money. The polish keeps a shine for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: LavenderLady 62

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: This color is beautiful and the polish is great quality. Application was smooth and easy and the color was opaque in two coats.
customer_reviews.author: kapplejack

customer_reviews.title: Deep Red, Very Flattering
customer_reviews.text: I love this shade, very flattering on my neutral to warm skin tone. It has an average longevity which is why it’s 4, not 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: This sucked opening up the box to see such a mess
customer_reviews.text: The package was danaged. The nail polish was broken and I could smell it before I opened it. Good Job..NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Product Arrived Unsealed
customer_reviews.text: I received the nail polish with the cap unsealed. I have never ordered an OPI nail polish that did not arrive with a very distinctive seal on the Top to the bottle requiring it to be taken off prior to being opened. I am very concerned with the quality of this product since it arrived completely unsealed.
customer_reviews.author: DMZ

customer_reviews.title: Typical OPI Nail Lacquer
customer_reviews.text: Not sheer. Color is darker than what’s shown in ad. Since it’s lacquer; it’s more difficult to remove than polish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A classic OPI polish, red. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used OPI nail polish for 25 years. This is one of my all time favorite. It's hard to find this color. The the ' thrill of Brazil ' It arrived in perfect condition. With the intense red. 100 percent. Will buy more from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: thatbooklynn

product_meta.title: OPI Nail Polish, Nail Lacquer, Red Nail Polish, 0.5 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Color:I'm Not Really a WaitressYou'll never go wrong with our signature NAIL POLISHES. Discover all of OPI's iconic NAIL POLISH shades or check out our trendy new collections.
Nail Lacquer is the original NAIL POLISH formula that reinvented quality nail color, your top choice if you enjoy updating your manicure weekly. This RED NAIL POLISH will draw gazes with pearly, opalescent coverage. Complete just about any look with this great NAIL POLISH shade. For best results, use with OPI Natural Base Coat and OPI Top Coat or RapiDry Top Coat. Made in the USA. 

 * A vivacious chianti RED NAIL POLISH
 * Draw their gazes with pearly, opalescent coverage with this NAIL POLISH SHADE
 * Awards: Sunday Times Style Beauty Awards 2015, Best Beauty Awards 2015
 * Complete any look with this pink NAIL LACQUER shade so deep, it's almost red, Devious!
 * OPI's NAIL POLISH formula that reinvented quality nail color is your top choice if you enjoy updating your manicure weekly
 * OPI Nail Lacquer NAIL POLISH provides up to 7 days of wear and easily removes with Expert Touch Lacquer Remover
 * Apply OPI Natural Nail Base Coat, then apply two coats of NAIL POLISH color, finish with OPI Top Coat, then let dry
 * OPI NAIL POLISH is available in 200+ polishes including OPI's most iconic NAIL POLISH and GEL NAIL POLISH shades
 * If this OPI color is one of your faves, enroll in Subscribe and Save so you never run out



ABOUT OPI
OPI is the #1 salon NAIL POLISH brand worldwide, offering a full line of nail polish, GEL NAIL POLISH, nail treatments, & skin care products. We exist to transform the world with color, as we believe color brings emotion to life.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
